attributes.action: continue to operate evening buses in North Hertfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that North Hertfordshire District Council in conjunction with Hertfordshire County Council should continue to provide a quality evening bus service in the Hitchin, Letchworth, Baldock & Stotfold area and that the current 97, 99 and 54 Monday to Saturday evening and Sunday evenings services should continue ( and even be improved ) to run after 7:30pm, instead of these services been withdrawn from 25 November 2007.
Also that other operator’s tickets should be valid over comparable routes, should the evening route be operated be a different company, to that of the daytime route.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
